message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?

I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm very interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $12,000 is quite a bit below my asking price.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $14,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm confident that this is a price you can live with, and I'm excited about the potential for this product to benefit me.
